column4: I've got a client who we just installed a dual boot with ubuntu, after install we went through and picked up software using the gui utility, among the packages is gnucash...can anybody tell me where in the menuing system it would have made a link to it?  He can run it from cli but would like to be able to open it with a mouse click...any help appreciated...I don't have it running locally....
tell him to install and use Alacarte
